name: crisper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a colder part at the bottom of a fridge (= a piece of kitchen equipment that preserves food at a cold temperature), used for keeping fruit and vegetables fresh and firm: Store apples in a crisper in the refrigerator to retain quality. Use your fridge thermometer to check the temperature of the crisper and shelves.
More examplesFewer examplesStore the fruit in paper bags on a shelf in the refrigerator as opposed to a crisper.Line the crisper with a paper towel, which will eliminate moisture.Some leeks in the crisper drawer were not looking so crisp.
